# value

**Instance Property**

The current value of the slider.

## Declaration

```swift
var value: Float { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is the slider’s minimum value. You may set a value only if it’s within the slider’s minimum and maximum values, otherwise the system throws an exception.



## Accessing the control value

- **prominentValues**: Values in this array may receive unique visual representations or behaviors.
- **localizedValueFormat**: A localized string that defines the presentation of the slider’s value.
